sn12.10:1.1: “Pubbeva me, bhikkhave, sambodha anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi:
sn12.10:1.2: ‘kiccham vatayam loko apanno jayati ca jiyati ca miyati ca cavati ca upapajjati ca.
sn12.10:1.3: Atha ca panimassa dukkhassa nissaranam nappajanati jaramaranassa.
sn12.10:1.4: Kudassu nama imassa dukkhassa nissaranam pannayissati jaramaranassa’ti?
sn12.10:2.2: ‘kimhi nu kho sati jaramaranam hoti, kimpaccaya jaramaranan’ti?
sn12.10:2.3: Tassa mayham, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
sn12.10:2.4: ‘jatiya kho sati jaramaranam hoti, jatipaccaya jaramaranan’ti.
sn12.10:3.12: Tassa mayham, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
sn12.10:3.13: ‘avijjaya kho sati sankhara honti, avijjapaccaya sankhara’ti.
sn12.10:4.4: ‘Samudayo, samudayo’ti kho me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi, nanam udapadi, panna udapadi, vijja udapadi, aloko udapadi.
sn12.10:5.2: ‘kimhi nu kho asati jaramaranam na hoti, kissa nirodha jaramarananirodho’ti?
sn12.10:5.3: Tassa mayham, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
sn12.10:5.4: ‘jatiya kho asati jaramaranam na hoti, jatinirodha jaramarananirodho’ti.
sn12.10:6.2: ‘kimhi nu kho asati jati na hoti …pe…
sn12.10:6.11: sankhara na honti, kissa nirodha sankharanirodho’ti?
sn12.10:6.12: Tassa mayham, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
sn12.10:6.13: ‘avijjaya kho asati sankhara na honti, avijjanirodha sankharanirodho’ti.
sn12.10:7.4: ‘Nirodho, nirodho’ti kho me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi, nanam udapadi, panna udapadi, vijja udapadi, aloko udapadi”ti.
